item.title: BLOG #4: Coining a Terminology
item.description: The term “Visionfactotum” combines the words “vision” and “factotum” to create a new word that refers to the ability to quickly adapt to changes in one’s environment or circumstances that are related to vision. It suggests that the ability to see clearly and adapt to changes in what we see is essential to success in today’s fast-paced world. 1. Which factors led you to coming up with this term? The term “Visionfactotum” was inspired by the observation that in today’s fast-paced world, it is increasingly important for individuals and society as a whole to be able to quickly adapt to changes.
